entry.title: Package Relay Proposal
entry.summary: Tom Trevethan inquired about the availability of submitpackage RPC on mainnet in the current core release via bitcoin-dev mailing list. He also enquired about any plans or timeline for its deployment in the next release. Greg replied stating that a PR was opened, with caveats, to address this concern and provided a link to it. Additionally, he shared a link for higher level tracking of the project. The details of the links were not provided.
